aws_apigatewayv2_model.subcategory: API Gateway v2 (WebSocket and HTTP APIs)
aws_apigatewayv2_model.description: Manages an Amazon API Gateway Version 2 model.

content_type.description: The content-type for the model, for example, `application/json`.

name.description: The name of the model. Must be alphanumeric.

schema.description: The schema for the model. This should be a [JSON schema draft 4](https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-zyp-json-schema-04
